title: AR/VR-Based Construction Site Safety Training Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Construction Site Safety Regulations and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Environment enabling real-time collaboration and situational simulations using digital devices

learning_goals: In AR/VR environments, learners can identify the five major hazards at construction sites (falls, collapses, fires, electric shocks, heavy equipment accidents) and perform safety measures with 90% accuracy.
Using PBL methods, learners can design team-based safety scenarios and develop risk response strategies through VR simulations.
Through formative assessments, learners can diagnose individual safety awareness levels and establish improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
